(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB simply))
    (VP (VBP love)
      (NP (JJ braised) (NN pork) (JJ soft) (NN bone)))
    (, ,)))

            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN bowl))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT this) (NNP Braised) (NNP Pork) (NNP Noodle))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNP Pork) (NNP Soft) (NNP Bone))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBN cooked)
          (SBAR (IN till)
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (MD can)
                (VP (VB finish)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN bowl))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN noodle))))
                  (PP (IN without)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG leaving)
                        (NP (NN anything))
                        (PP
                          (PP (IN in)
                            (NP (DT the) (NN bowl)))
                          (CC or)
                          (PP (IN on)
                            (NP
                              (NP (DT the) (NN table))
                              (ADVP (JJ next)
                                (PP (TO to)
                                  (NP (DT the) (NN bowl)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (SQ (VBP Do)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VB think)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (S
            (VP (VBG throwing)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ unedible) (NN stuff))
              (PP (IN onto)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN table))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ elderly) (JJ Ah) (NN Soh))
                      (CC or)
                      (NP (DT the) (NNP Bangladeshi) (NN worker))))))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB clean)
                    (PRT (RP up)))))))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (UCP
              (ADJP (JJ right) (JJ etiquette))
              (CC or)
              (NP
                (SQ (MD should)
                  (NP (PRP we))
                  (VP (VB become)
                    (NP (JJR more))
                    (UCP
                      (ADJP (JJ civic) (JJ minded))
                      (CC and)
                      (ADJP (`` ``) (JJ developed) ('' ''))
                      (CC and)
                      (ADVP (RB politely)))))
                (VP (VB leave)
                  (NP (NN everything))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (PRP$ our) (NN bowl))))))))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (IN At) (JJS least))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB have)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB face)
              (NP (DT this) (NN dilemma))
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB when))
                (S
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG eating)
                      (NP (DT this) (NN dish))
                      (PP (IN since)
                        (NP (NN nothing)))))
                  (ADVP (RB much))
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (VP (VBN left)
                      (SBAR
                        (WHADVP (WRB when))
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP you))
                          (VP (VBP are)
                            (VP (VBN finished)
                              (PP (IN with)
                                (NP (DT the) (NN pork))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(have-6, At-1)
pobj(At-1, least-2)
nsubj(have-6, I-3)
aux(have-6, do-4)
neg(have-6, n't-5)
root(ROOT-0, have-6)
aux(face-8, to-7)
xcomp(have-6, face-8)
det(dilemma-10, this-9)
dobj(face-8, dilemma-10)
advmod(left-19, when-11)
csubjpass(left-19, eating-12)
det(dish-14, this-13)
dobj(eating-12, dish-14)
prep(eating-12, since-15)
pobj(since-15, nothing-16)
advmod(left-19, much-17)
auxpass(left-19, is-18)
advcl(face-8, left-19)
advmod(finished-23, when-20)
nsubjpass(finished-23, you-21)
auxpass(finished-23, are-22)
advcl(left-19, finished-23)
prep(finished-23, with-24)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ sweet))
      (CC and)
      (NP (PRP you)))
    (VP (VBP get)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN hint))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NN cinnamon)
            (CC and)
            (NN star) (NN anise))))
      (PP (IN without)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBG being)
            (PP (IN over)
              (S
                (VP (VBG powering))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (NNP Conclusion))
    (SBAR (IN If)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP
          (VP (VBP like)
            (NP (NN pork) (JJ soft) (NNS bones)))
          (CC or)
          (VP
            (ADVP (RB just))
            (VBP need)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ extra) (NN collagen))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS osteoarthritis))))))
        (, ,)))))

nsubj(like-4, you-3)
dep(Conclusion-1, like-4)
nn(bones-7, pork-5)
amod(bones-7, soft-6)
dobj(like-4, bones-7)
cc(like-4, or-8)

poss(osteoarthritis-16, your-15)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (NN place)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB go)
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP
                  (ADJP (RB relatively) (JJ cheap))
                  (JJ soft) (NN bone) (NN fix))))))))
    (. .)))

nn(fix-12, bone-11)
